title: Take a little time: infection control at work
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Health Dept. AIDS STD Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infection
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/AIDS (Disease) - Prevention

description: Designed for emergency care workers and addresses the risks and prevention of the occupational transmission of communicable diseases, particularly HIV and Hepatitis B. Presented by Dr. Gael Jennings and accompanied by a 10p. booklet.
